faq.text: 🍿 | Hey, our bot is quite big, and there is a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories, choose which information you want to get >
faq.game_point:
🦕 In DinoGochi you become the owner of a unique dinosaur. Our game combines the atmosphere of a classic Tamagotchi and RPG elements: you care for your pet, develop its skills, participate in adventures and competitions.

🎋 However, DinoGochi is not only about care. Your path is defined by you:
- You can focus on developing your dinosaur, training it and unlocking new abilities.
- Or engage in trading rare resources, building your own economy.
- Or perhaps you want to explore the world, participate in events, team up with other players, or compete for the title of the strongest.

✨ DinoGochi is an open sandbox where you choose your own playstyle.
 Grow, trade, explore, win — or just enjoy life with your dinosaur.
faq.dino_mood:
🎈 *What is a dinosaur's mood?*
The mood reflects your dinosaur's overall state: how happy, satisfied, and ready for new adventures it is. Monitoring the mood is important for the pet to develop faster and be more effective in travels.

🍎 *What does the mood depend on?*
The mood depends on your attention: play with the dinosaur, take care of it, feed it favorite dishes, and don't forget about communication. The more care — the better the mood!

👀 *Where to see the dinosaur's mood?*
You can see the current mood in your dinosaur's profile. We display it through special indicators and color tags.

💥 *What does good or bad mood give?*
With a good mood, the dinosaur receives useful bonuses: develops faster, fights more successfully, and handles tasks more easily. With a low mood, nervous breakdowns are possible: the dinosaur may refuse to perform commands or lose motivation.
faq.dino_height:
*🌱 What's going on with dinosaurs' growth?*
A dinosaur grows for 30 days after birth. However, each dinosaur is unique: some can grow into large creatures, and some will remain small.
faq.kindergarten:
🏫 *What is a kindergarten?*
Kindergarten is a premium feature that allows you to send your dinosaur to kindergarten for a few hours a day. During this time, your pet is cared for and stays in a good mood.
faq.dino_skills:
🎯 *What are dinosaur skills?*
Skills are characteristics that directly affect the success of your dinosaur in various activities. They are upgraded through training and unlock various bonuses.

🌟 *What bonuses do skills give?*
- With high charisma, there is a chance to cancel bad mood.
- Dexterity reduces the time to complete tasks.
- Charisma gives a discount on promotion.
- High charisma increases the chance of gaining additional experience in gathering food, games, travel, and sleep.
- When gathering resources, the chance to find rarer items increases.
- In games, the dinosaur receives an additional bonus with high charisma.
- With high intelligence, there is a chance to immediately create 1 more item.

💪 *How to upgrade skills?*
Skills can be upgraded by sending the dinosaur to training. Different training develops different skills!
faq.settings:
⚙️ *What can be customized in the game?*
In DinoGochi, many settings are available to make the game even more comfortable:

- Turn off daily reward notifications.
- Adjust inventory page size.
- Rename the dinosaur.
- Set interface view for profile.
- Delete account.
- Set how dinosaurs will call their owner.
- Choose bot language.
- Set permission for talking to the owner.
- Set bot nickname.
- Reset avatar.

All settings are available in the special menu section.
faq.friends:
🤝 *What are friends in DinoGochi?*
Friends allow interaction with other players and developing multiplayer gameplay. Friend features:

- View friend's profile.
- Share coins and items.
- Hatch joint dinosaurs.
- Change friend's name for convenience.
- Send dinosaurs to play together.

👥 *How to become friends?*
You can add a friend through the special menu or using the `/add_me` command in the group.
faq.referal:
💎 *What is the referral system?*
The referral system allows you to earn bonuses for inviting friends to the game.

🤍 *How does the referral system work?*
After clicking on the referral link, you immediately become friends with the inviting player.

💜 *What do I get when my friend reaches level 5?*
You receive a rare or unusual egg!

❤️ *What will my friend receive?*
The friend will receive the following bonuses: 255 coins, 🍯 Honey jar x2, 🍪 Cookies x2, 🧸 Bear, 🍗 Chicken leg x2, 🍒 Berries x2, 🦪 Small fish x2, 🎂 Cake
faq.market:
🏪 *What is the market?*
The market is a completely independent system for exchanging items and coins. Each player can customize their shop profile.

🖼️ *Can I set a profile picture on the market?*
Yes, with a subscription, you can set your profile picture.

💸 *What exchanges are available on the market?*
The following exchanges are available on the market:
- Item for coins and vice versa.
- Item for item.
- Item auction, where the highest bid wins.
faq.dino_tavern:
🍻 *What is a tavern?*
Tavern — is a place where you can get quests and hear fascinating stories.

🎯 *What can be done in the tavern?*
- Get a quest that will give you additional tasks and bonuses.
- Hear interesting stories that may provide hints for future adventures.
faq.events:
🎉 *What are events?*
Events are special in-game events that can appear both in the bot and as additional events.

🎮 *What types of events are there?*
- Bot events are temporary quests and activities that appear for a certain period.
- Additional events may include bonuses, new mechanics or unique items that are available for a limited time.
faq.donate:
💖 *What are the donations for?*
Funds received from players are used for the following needs:

- Paying for hosting so that the bot always works stably.
- Advertising to attract new players.
- Incentives for the work of people involved in the development of the bot.
- Some treats to maintain the team's motivation.
faq.super_coins:
💎 *What are super coins?*
Super coins are a special currency that can be obtained by watching ads or making a donation.

🎁 *What can be bought with super coins?*
Super coins can be spent on special items available with the `/super` command.
faq.more_dinos:
🐾 *How to get more dinosaurs?*
The number of dinosaurs you can have depends on your level and subscription:

- Every 20th level gives +1 slot for a dinosaur.
- With a premium subscription, you get +1 slot.
- Also, 1 slot for a shared dinosaur is always available.
faq.craft:
⚒️ *What is craft?*
Craft is the process of creating items using recipes and materials. Some recipes require time to create.

📝 *Where to find recipes?*
Recipes can be found at the market, from the junk dealer, or while traveling.
faq.breakdown:
😣 *What is a nervous breakdown in a dinosaur?*
Nervous breakdown is a condition that can occur if the dinosaur is in a very bad mood.

⚠️ *How to prevent a nervous breakdown?*
To prevent a nervous breakdown, you need to lift the dinosaur's mood by paying attention to it, feeding it, or performing other actions. If it doesn't succeed immediately, just wait, and the mood will improve over time.
faq.general:
🎈 *Rarity*
Events and dinosaurs are divided by rarity.
The higher the rarity, the sweeter the reward.

 1. Common - 50%
 2. Uncommon - 25%
 3. Rare - 15%
 4. Mystical - 9%
 5. Legendary - 1%

🕹 *Interactions*
To interact with the dinosaur, go to `🕹 Actions`.

 1. To feed the dinosaur, you need to gather food, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍕 Collect food` and follow the instructions.

 2. To feed the dinosaur, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍣 Feed` and choose suitable food.

 3. In `🎮 Entertainment` you can select a game and entertain the dinosaur to improve its mood.

 4. In `🎑 Travel` you can find various items, meet friends, and see a lot of interesting things!

 5. `🌙 Put to sleep` the dinosaur needs sleep daily, don't forget to put it to bed!

🎮 *Profile*
 To view inventory or check your statistics, go to `👁‍🗨 Profile`
faq.eat:
🥙 *What does my dinosaur eat?*
Look at your dinosaur's profile, dinosaurs live in their natural environment.

Herbivores are where there is a lot of grass, predators in the forests/jungles, and those who love fish fly in the clouds.

🍕 *Treats*
🍯 Jar of honey, 🥞 Sweet pancakes - dinosaurs love treats and regardless of their type, they will happily eat them!

Also, this food gives bonuses to mood / health, etc.

You can find all the information about the item in the inventory!
faq.accessories:
🏓 *Accessories*
Accessories open additional opportunities or speed up the activity. 
Accessories can be equipped while the dinosaur is doing nothing, using it in the inventory.
Accessories can be found in travels or dungeons.

🎲 *Here are some of them...*
 🧸 Teddy bear - allows you to select sleep mode.
 🛠 Tools - speed up food gathering.

tavern_enter: Upon entering the tavern, you feel a pleasant coolness and hear the sounds of creaking wooden furniture, the aroma of food and drinks makes you hungry.
Returning to the tavern, you see many tables filled with beer and freshly squeezed juices, as well as a lively crowd having loud and joyful fun after a long day.
Bright lights and a soulful atmosphere welcome you at the entrance, surrounding this place, filled with tourists and locals, warmly welcoming each new guest.
Entering inside, you see a huge bar, full of various drinks, and a noisy crowd filling every corner of the tavern that is teeming with life and tempting food.
Looking around, you notice a dark interior soaked with alcoholic and smoking products, and a group of musicians playing on the stage in the center of the hall, reminiscent of a life on the move.

You enter a tiny tavern filled with wooden barrels along the walls and floor tanks supporting an underground reservoir, and the bartender standing at the bar with a smile on his face is preparing your favorite cocktail.

The surroundings of the tavern are immersed in a measured calmness, upon entering, you notice the tranquility conducive to relaxed rest, and the walls are covered with old pictures and inscriptions drawn by guests, creating a warm atmosphere.

Entering a huge tavern, you are greeted by several cozy areas where you can spend time with loved ones and friends; the upper floor surprises with a unique dynamic lighting system, it makes the hall sing and dance peacefully, blending into a unique roof structure.

On this peaceful evening, full of the aroma of the most delicious homemade food, you latch the door of the main hall of the tavern and a calm cozy corner opens up for you in the middle of the misty tower, mesmerized by its depth and mystery.
Entering a small tavern, you see a cozy and inviting potion, where alternative music plays and aromas of fast food create a genuine carefree leisure.
Upon entering the tavern door, you feel warm magic and meet a wide bar counter where happy guests are already watching the proceedings.
Enter the tavern, and you will immediately feel the atmosphere of friendliness, relaxation, and enjoyment of royal cuisine.
You crookedly smile, sit down at the long table filled with food and drinks, where a large screen hangs showing games.
Once inside, you immediately understand that it embodies everything you expect from a tavern where loud conversations, live music, and abundant food rightfully take first place.
Enveloped in the aromas of an exquisite holiday dinner, you look at juicy steaks and bottles of fine wine, where shining glasses and soles make guests relax and enjoy the evening.
Inside the tavern, you see a mounted bar counter, lively guests chatting, and fiery working factories making the atmosphere even more fiery.

book_forest:
Ancient and mighty forest with giant trees, that’s what they say about this forest...
 I, Fredrik Al Johnson, will check this myself!
26.08.3--7 15:38: I just entered the forest, it looks like a simple forest, except for the huge trees!

26.08.3--7 19:12: Saw a beautiful sunset, went to look for a place to rest.

26.08.2--7 21:01: Did not see any dangerous animals all day, only trees, trees, trees.

27.08.3--7 13:59: Crossed a rushing river, almost lost all my belongings.

27.08.3--7: I somehow lost my watch, now I can't tell the time, but it's getting dark.

27.08.3--7: I see a light in the distance, I'll try to get closer.
27.08.3--7: I can't believe my eyes, is this... dinosaurs?! Am I definitely not losing my mind?
I'm writing quickly, it seems someone of them has felt me, I'm leaving.

28.08 +- 2 days: I don't know how long I have been here, someone is constantly walking above me, I haven't restocked water and food for a long time, soon I will have to risk. I'm not sure I can resist the DINOSAURS (YES, IT'S DEFINITELY THEM!)
I will leave it lying here, I hope I will come back here.
book_lost-islands: It's me again, Aot. Today Propan told me about the ancient ruins on the island and we are heading there.

When we went ashore, it became hot and we swam.

After that, walking along the coast, we noticed among the palms the ruins of an old temple.

Entering inside, we were amazed by the grandeur of the ancient structure. Columns stood everywhere, and bas-reliefs were carved into the walls.

Having examined the temple, we found 300 coins!

Propane suddenly tripped over something and fell to the ground. I looked at it. It turned out to be a book.

 Soon we examined a few more temples, found a cake and 3 mushrooms.

We fell asleep on the sand.

And in the morning, we went back home.
book_desert: Who doesn't know about mysterious pyramids, sand dunes, and poisonous snakes?

This short story from my perspective about why it is worth, and sometimes not necessary, to go into the desert where dinosaurs roam.

Let's start.

Having stocked up on supplies, I set out to explore the desert.

The first day went perfectly... except that the sun was relentlessly scorching.

I found 50 square coins where are they here?

 The next day I reached the pyramid. And it seems I am not the only one.

 A huge dinosaur was about 20 meters away from me. It pushed the wall and entered inside I waited for about 5 minutes, then I also went in. The pyramid was huge, filled with labyrinths and passages.

I will not fully describe the pyramid, as it will take a very long time.

I will only say that I found a parchment with an image of a backpack and strange symbols.

I fell asleep right inside the pyramid.
The next morning I woke up feeling that someone was watching me. I open my eyes and see... A DINOSAUR! He was standing right in front of me and examining me, tilting his head slightly.

And then the dinosaur spoke. He said to me - "hello!"
-"Hello," I replied.
-My name is Propan, what's yours?
-Ahot.
-Let's be friends?
-Sure.
-Then I will call you envoy of darkness because I don't know how you appeared here.
book_mountains: Hello, it's me again, Aot. Today, Propane and I will go on a journey to the mountains.

Crystal mountains... How beautiful... And cold. Brrr.

Walking through the snow Propan suddenly fell into a snowdrift. Crawled out. And fell again. Then he counted the coins, took out the square and threw it into the snow.

An hour later, it started snowing and the dinosaur got upset.

When we sat by the fire, a polar bear approached us. Propan hit it in the side with its hind paw. The bear flew back a couple of meters, but still managed to grab a dinosaur.

The next day we found an egg. It shimmered. Here it is white. And now it is green. And in a moment, it is blue. Now purple. Orange. And again white.

 We continued our journey.

Propan bent down and picked up a sheet of parchment.

This is a cake recipe, - he explained - I love cakes.

 And suddenly a snowstorm swept in.

We found ourselves in a forest of strange trees, and between the trunks, our house was visible.

 We reached it and sat down to drink tea.

string_to_str.info:
⚽ It is convenient to specify time in some commands not with numbers, but with text, here is a reminder.

If you have been sent here, then you can use text input methods for time. You can try it right here, type `/string_to_sec` `1d` `1h` `12m`
You will receive 90720 in response - this is the number of seconds calculated from your message.

What characters can be used?
`w` - Week, `d` - day, `h` - hour, `m` - minute, `s` - second (the letter can be omitted)

_By the way, you can specify the same sign as many times as you want and in any order._
